articles.author: Dato Parulava
articles.title: Nordic countries dominate world happiness rankings (again) - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: Fourteen of the top 20 nations are European, but Western nations are less happy now than a decade ago, according to the World Happiness Report.
articles.content: The report, published by the University of Oxford’s Wellbeing Research Centre, is based on Gallup World Poll data, which ranks countries according to self-assessed life evaluations averaged over the … [+1143 chars]
